book_value.description: Net value of a company assets as found on its balance sheet

diluted_eps_ttm.description: amount of income each receives if all of the dilute securities are realized, which is the amount of income that is available to the current common shareholders

dividend_share.description: rewards that a company gives to its shareholders

dividend_yield.description: amount of money a company pays shareholders for owning a

earnings_share.description: earnings per share (ESP) is a company net profit divided by the number of common shares it has outstanding

ebitda.description: Earnings before Interest Taxes Depreciation and Amortization

eps_estimate_current_quarter.description: earnings per share (EPS) estimate for current quarter

eps_estimate_current_year.description: earnings per share estimate for current year

eps_estimate_next_quarter.description: earnings per share estimate for next quarter

eps_estimate_next_year.description: earnings per share estimate for next year

fundamental_id.description: unique company id for fundamental data

growth_profit_ttm.description: profit a business makes after subtracting all the costs that are related to manufacturing and selling its products or services

most_recent_quarter.description: MRQ refers to percent of revenues remaining after paying all expenses

operating_margin_ttm.description: measures the percent of revenues remaining after paying all operating expenses for trailing twelve months

profit_margin.description: profit margin measures the degree to which a company makes money equals to revenue cost divided by Revenue

quarterly_earnings_growth_yoy.description: an increase in the companys sales from one quarter to the next, compared on a year-over-year basis

quarterly_revenue_growth_yoy.description: increase in the companys sales from one quarter to the next a good yoy growth is between 15 to 45%

return_on_assets_ttm.description: income after taxes for the trailing twelve months divided by the average total assets

return_on_equity_ttm.description: income available to common stockholders for the trailing twelve months divided by the average common equity expressed as a percentage

revenue_per_share_ttm.description: Sales per share (Revenue) is a ratio that computes the total revenue earned for the trailing twelve months

revenue_ttm.description: revenue a company earns over the trailing twelve months (TTM)

target_price.description: The value an investor or analyst anticipates a stock will reach within a defined time period

enterprise_value_ebitda.description: Enterprise value/EBITDA is a popular valuation manyple used to determine the fair market value of a company.

enterprise_value_revenue.description: The enterprise value-to-revenue manyple (EV/R) is a measure of the value of a stock that compares a company's enterprise value to its revenue.

forward_pe.description: A variation of the price-to-earnings ratio (P/E ratio) is the forward P/E ratio, which is based on a prediction of a company's future earnings

price_book_mrq.description: This is the Current Price divided by the latest annual Tangible Book Value Per Share.

price_sales_ttm.description: The price-to-sales ratio shows how much the market values every dollar of the company's sales.

trailing_pe.description: relative valuation multiple that is based on the last 12 months of actual earnings

non_controlling_interest_in_consolidated.description: Non Controlling Interest in consolidated equity (Float)

temporary_equity_redeemable_non_controll.description: temporary equity redeemable non controlling interests (Float)

info.description:
Intelligent EOD Stocks API

End of day stock world wide STOCK API, this api is intended for use by web application developers, and service providers looking for up-to-date always available.

  • Exchange Information
  • Stock Tickers Data
  • End of Day (EOD) Stock Data
  • Fundamental Data
  • Stock Options And Splits Data
  • Financial News API
  • Social Media Trend Data For Stocks
  • Sentiment Analysis for News & Social Media
The information provided covers more than 150 000 tickers, stocks, mutual funds and more around the world. we provide information for any period, including daily, weekly.
info.title: EOD STOCK API
